Name: Permit filing fees for new buildings and alterations.
Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to permit filing fees for new buildings and alterations
Summary: This bill would alter permit filing fees for new buildings and alterations.
Text:
Be it enacted by the Council as follows:

	Section 1. Table 28-112.2 of the administrative code of the city of New York, as amended by local law number 141 for the year 2013, is amended to read as follows:
